Intercepted messages use RSA keys from two servers. They forgot to use unique primes. Can you recover the secret from ciphertext1: 6519607921280508537956315866172280343769424963471024800601774786834635150453879151188467952606263675298361641109840242536659018881062144018768115557165717, ciphertext2: 906856774308116308600276671055029427418933859479376781835242731001335719716815086334781015488524596041219533422352484903821827886317375695315636163184891?

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=9403707216005209759633409043769413345239860414488789012870920601099822792773741485588537137877736473544480881774217387444526900118342750679865562189562729, n2=10251485728201488661747793646366132948976566353513809067146237120668405183550371956977500700659735151535103633478243639243701580572645095009985028577954447, e=3967221047480172366103129582966519226889099624964735990238482466656545131960587383920246009997029345242860188361045487687908113374498490175478524353151853

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{xcit0t9h}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 6519607921280508537956315866172280343769424963471024800601774786834635150453879151188467952606263675298361641109840242536659018881062144018768115557165717, ciphertext2: 906856774308116308600276671055029427418933859479376781835242731001335719716815086334781015488524596041219533422352484903821827886317375695315636163184891
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=9403707216005209759633409043769413345239860414488789012870920601099822792773741485588537137877736473544480881774217387444526900118342750679865562189562729, n2=10251485728201488661747793646366132948976566353513809067146237120668405183550371956977500700659735151535103633478243639243701580572645095009985028577954447, e=3967221047480172366103129582966519226889099624964735990238482466656545131960587383920246009997029345242860188361045487687908113374498490175478524353151853
extra_info: p=84065132156841122477472533154237188162959445717672864875490378070370841050237, q=111862159432053507172939972146891123433182555827556542449617017619280141505117, r=91643910507810024619723514267281385388570544830841835931685273012375952726491, φ(n1)=9403707216005209759633409043769413345239860414488789012870920601099822792773545558296948243248086061039179753462621245442981670711017643284175911207007376, φ(n2)=10251485728201488661747793646366132948976566353513809067146237120668405183550168450907560837127942488048689460969421886143043182194263792719353372483722840
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
